description: A modular AI system for relational, cognitive, and spiritual alignment.

Core.description: Handles NovaAI’s initialization, routing, and diagnostic stability.

Systems.description: Relational, cognitive, and physical systems including Body, Mind, and Spirit.

Data.description: Repositories for knowledge, scripture, and thematic mappings.

OmniCode.description: NovaAI’s creative and universal coding framework.

Resources.description: Static assets such as visuals, audio, and libraries.

StoragePlan.description: Backup and external storage management for SSDs and HDDs.

FutureModules.description: Placeholders for future systems and exploratory development.

Utilities.description: Tools for debugging, workflows, and automation.

Output.description: Logs, reports, and generated data from NovaAI’s operations.

Users.description: Stores user-specific configurations and relational data.

Documentation.description: Guides, concept logs, and development records.
